name: Dieng Plateu - A Journey to Land of Gods
description: A compound of eight small exotic Hindu temples from mid 7th century AD, sits at 2,000 metres above sea level as the oldest standing stone structures in Java. Surrounded by green scenery of vegetables fields, guarded by mount Sindoro and Sumbing, decorated by mist in the morning and the strong smell of sulfur from some craters, you can find yourself in the highest village in Java island and experience the friendly smile of the locals.
